SYN_1_7_2759:
[Indication]
Complex parapneumonic effusion / Empyema, Left side.
[Anesthesia]
15 mL Lidocaine 1%.
[Description]
Ultrasound confirmed loculated, hyperechoic fluid. A 24Fr pigtail catheter was inserted into the L pleural space. 550 mL of purulent fluid was evacuated.
[Plan]
Connect to Pleurovac suction (-20cmH2O). Antibiotics as per ID.
